500.message: Something went wrong. Our technical delivery drivers are on it.

502.message: The communication relay is cut off. The connection with the server failed.

503.message: Eco-responsible break... Service will be back very soon!

504.message: Response time exceeded. Even the fastest can have a flat tire.

stats.in_progress: announcements in progress thanks to Ecodeli

hero_section.title: Eco-responsible delivery, within everyone's reach.
hero_section.subtitle: EcoDeli is a carpooling platform that connects individuals with eco-friendly and solidarity deliveries. By sharing their journeys, users can ship or transport packages at lower cost while promoting their carbon footprint and social connection.

collaborative_delivery.title: Collaborative package delivery
collaborative_delivery.description: We help reduce carbon footprint by promoting collaborative transport of goods. EcoDeli facilitates connections between shippers and carriers for a greener service.

personal_services.title: Personal services
personal_services.description: Find reliable people for local missions: occasional deliveries, shopping, daily trips. The future of transport relies on local mutual aid, more economical, more human and ethical.

product_repatriation.title: Product purchases and repatriation
product_repatriation.description: Buy or collect items and provisions locally, without constraints, by traveling more intelligently.

chariot_rental.title: Cart release
chariot_rental.description: EcoDeli encourages useful and flexible cart exchange between individuals, made available in key areas.

faq_section.title: Do you have questions? That's normal!

what_is_ecodeli.question: What is EcoDeli and how does it work?
what_is_ecodeli.answer: EcoDeli is a crowdshipping platform that connects shippers with travelers or drivers ready to transport their packages during already planned trips, thus reducing ecological impact. Users post an announcement, track the package in real time and benefit from secure delivery thanks to insurance offered by EcoDeli.

become_delivery_person.question: How can I become a delivery person on EcoDeli?
become_delivery_person.answer: To become a delivery person, simply create an account on EcoDeli, then browse available announcements around you. Once an announcement is selected, you can propose your trip and agree on terms with the shipper. It's simple, fast and without commitment.

delivery_security.question: Are deliveries secure and insured?
delivery_security.answer: Yes, EcoDeli implements several measures to ensure delivery security. Profiles are verified, exchanges are secured via the platform, and we encourage users to leave reviews to strengthen trust. Insurance can also be offered for certain packages according to their value.

legal_mentions.title: Legal notices
legal_mentions.intro: In accordance with applicable legal provisions, you will find below information relating to the site publisher, privacy policy, general terms and conditions, as well as an important note on the fictional nature of the project.

legal_notice.title: Legal notices
legal_notice.content:
This site is published by an individual as part of an academic project at ESGI (École Supérieure de Génie Informatique).

Publisher identity:
Names: Johan LEDOUX, Guillaume CONSTANTY, Rayan CHEBICHEB
Address: 242 rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75012 Paris, France
Email: ecodeli.fr@gmail.com
Phone: not disclosed

Intellectual property:
The images, illustrations and photographs used on this site are either free of rights or used with permission. Their intellectual property is respected and indicated when necessary.
The written texts come from the project team. Any external quote is attributed to its author or original source.

Hosting:
Host name: Guillaume CONSTANTY
Legal entity: individual
Address: Avon, France
Phone: not disclosed

privacy_policy.title: Privacy policy and cookies
privacy_policy.content:
EcoDeli places great importance on protecting your privacy.

No personal data is collected without your consent. The site uses Matomo, a privacy-respecting audience measurement tool, configured without cookies and without collecting identifiable personal data.

Technologies used on this site:
  • Svelte: frontend framework
  • TailwindCSS and DaisyUI: interface libraries
  • FontShare: free fonts

No data is shared with third parties, and no advertising is broadcast.

You can request deletion of any data concerning you by contacting the project team.

terms_of_use.title: General Terms of Use (GTU)
terms_of_use.content:
Access to and use of the EcoDeli site is reserved for strictly personal use, within the framework of project consultation. Any use for commercial or professional purposes is prohibited.

The user undertakes to use the site in compliance with current French legislation.

As the site is fictional, certain features may be inoperative or simulated for educational purposes.

The authors decline any responsibility regarding the use of information presented on this site.

terms_of_sale.title: General Terms of Sale (GTS)
terms_of_sale.content:
No real sale is made on this platform.

The General Terms of Sale are present only for illustrative purposes as part of the simulation project.

No payment, product or service will actually be delivered via EcoDeli.

Any reference to a transaction, price or order is fictional and has no contractual effect.

The user is informed that the site does not offer any commercial service.

disclaimer.title: Warning - Fictional project
disclaimer.content:
EcoDeli is a fictional educational project developed by ESGI students as part of their academic year.

This is not a real company, and no delivery or intermediation service is actually offered.

All displayed data (announcements, profiles, trips, etc.) are simulated.

The objective of this project is to demonstrate technical skills in web development, UX/UI, project management and deployment of modern applications.

Any resemblance to existing services is purely coincidental.

tutorial.discover_content: The Discover section allows you to find all available announcements.
tutorial.manage_content: In My announcements, you can create and manage all announcements you publish.
tutorial.messaging_content: The Messages section contains all your conversations with other users.
tutorial.account_content: In My account, you can manage your information, wallet and subscriptions.
tutorial.ready_content: You can now explore the platform. You can review this tutorial at any time from the "My account" page.
